en: Even the best fish smell when they are three days old.
zh: 再好的鱼放三天也会臭。

en: No matter how old I get, I'll still have the energy to play ping-pong.
zh: 无论我多大年纪，我仍然有精力打乒乓球。

en: He will arrive by eight at the latest.
zh: 他最晚八点会到。

en: Search as we would, we could not find it.
zh: 我们尽力搜索，也找不到它。

en: I haven't got the nerve to ask you for a loan.
zh: 我没有勇气向你借钱。

en: No matter how close we may be, I can not ask him to do that.
zh: 无论我们多么亲密，我都不能要求他做那件事。

en: Keep a tally of what you owe.
zh: 记下你欠了多少钱。

en: I don't care how much you say you love me. I know your feelings for her haven't changed.
zh: 我不在乎你说你有多爱我。我知道你对她的感情没有改变。

en: No matter how much you might think you like curry, three nights in a row is more than enough.
zh: 无论你多么喜欢咖喱，连续三个晚上都太过分了。

en: I've called and called, but there's no answer.
zh: 我打了又打，但没人接。

en: You can't study too hard.
zh: 学习再努力也不为过。

en: No amount of money will change his mind.
zh: 再多的钱也无法改变他的想法。

en: However hard he worked, he did not become any better off.
zh: 无论他多么努力工作，他的境况都没有好转。

en: No matter how hard you may try, you won't succeed so easily.
zh: 无论你多么努力尝试，你都不会那么容易成功。

en: We cannot work too hard.
zh: 我们再努力工作也不为过。

en: Even in the worst case, she will not die of such an illness.
zh: 即使在最坏的情况下，她也不会死于这种疾病。

en: Try as you may, you will never get him to agree.
zh: 无论你如何尝试，你永远不会让他同意。

en: Try as you may, you will find it impossible to give up that habit.
zh: 无论你如何尝试，你都会发现放弃那个习惯是不可能的。

en: Try as we may, we cannot swim to the rock.
zh: 无论我们如何尝试，我们都无法游到那块岩石。

en: Try as you may, you can't master English in a few months.
zh: 无论你如何尝试，你都无法在几个月内掌握英语。

en: What price will you give for this?
zh: 你打算出什么价买这个？

en: However much she eats, she never gains weight.
zh: 无论她吃多少，她都不会长胖。

en: I always enjoy listening to classical music when I have some free time.
zh: 我总是在有空的时候喜欢听古典音乐。

en: A number of books were stolen.
zh: 一些书被偷了。

en: I should be glad to be of any service to you.
zh: 我很乐意为您效劳。

en: I would be happy to be of any service to you.
zh: 我很乐意为您效劳。

en: We cannot finish it before Saturday even if everything goes well.
zh: 即使一切顺利，我们也无法在星期六之前完成。

en: After countless burials of the hatchet, we always dig it up again. There doesn't seem to be any sign of an ever-lasting peace.
zh: 无数次言归于好之后，我们总是重蹈覆辙。似乎没有任何永久和平的迹象。

en: No matter the age, a child is a child.
zh: 无论年龄大小，孩子终究是孩子。

en: I have some questions to ask, but I don't want to bother you now.
zh: 我有一些问题想问，但现在不想打扰你。

en: We ate several, but a good few were left.
zh: 我们吃了一些，但还剩下不少。

en: May I ask some questions?
zh: 我可以问几个问题吗？

en: Please permit me to ask you some questions.
zh: 请允许我问您几个问题。

en: The former is inferior to the latter in some respect.
zh: 前者在某些方面不如后者。

en: I don't like her in some ways.
zh: 我在某些方面不喜欢她。

en: You are wrong in some respects.
zh: 你在某些方面是错的。

en: I'm not at one with you in some respects.
zh: 我在某些方面和你的想法不一致。

en: He pointed out that the former was inferior to the latter in some respects.
zh: 他指出，前者在某些方面不如后者。

en: Localities imposed bans on development.
zh: 各地禁止开发。

en: Some fine phrases occurred to the poet.
zh: 诗人想到了一些优美的句子。

en: Some species gradually develop elaborate repertoires of dozens or even hundreds of variants of a basic song.
zh: 一些物种逐渐发展出复杂的曲目，包含几十甚至数百种基本歌曲的变体。

en: Some questions were asked me by the teacher.
zh: 老师问了我一些问题。

en: Some poems were also written by him.
zh: 他写了一些诗。

en: Some difficulties hindered him from doing it.
zh: 一些困难阻碍了他做这件事。

en: Your writing is good except for a few mistakes.
zh: 你的写作很好，除了一些错误。

en: Some families spend their vacation near the beach.
zh: 有些家庭在海滩附近度过他们的假期。

en: Some apples rotted on the tree.
zh: 一些苹果在树上腐烂了。

en: A combination of several mistakes led to the accident.
zh: 几个错误加在一起导致了这次事故。

en: Several teams are contending for the prize.
zh: 几支队伍正在争夺奖品。

en: Please take some of them.
zh: 请拿一些吧。

en: We have some local wine.
zh: 我们有一些当地的葡萄酒。

en: Several scenes have been cut from the original.
zh: 原始版本中删减了几个场景。

en: The English breakfast was made popular by the architects of the British Empire.
zh: 英式早餐因大英帝国的缔造者而广受欢迎。

en: The British government is against the plan.
zh: 英国政府反对这项计划。

en: The English are a polite people.
zh: 英国人是很有礼貌的民族。

en: The English are known for their courtesy.
zh: 英国人以他们的礼貌而闻名。

en: The English are said to be conservative.
zh: 据说英国人很保守。

en: The English are a practical people.
zh: 英国人是很务实的民族。

en: The English set a high value on freedom.
zh: 英国人非常重视自由。

en: England is proud of her poets.
zh: 英格兰以她的诗人为荣。

en: The English are said to be a practical people.
zh: 据说英国人是很务实的民族。

en: The English are a hardy people.
zh: 英国人是很坚韧的民族。

en: The English love the unicorn as much as they love the lion.
zh: 英国人像热爱狮子一样热爱独角兽。

en: The English entered into the tea trade at that time.
zh: 英国人当时开始涉足茶叶贸易。

en: On being introduced to somebody, a British person often shakes hands.
zh: 当被介绍给某人时，英国人通常会握手。

en: English people call elevators "lifts".
zh: 英国人称电梯为“lifts”。

en: The English established colonies in America.
zh: 英国人在美洲建立了殖民地。

en: The English established colonies in America in 1609.
zh: 英国人在1609年在美洲建立了殖民地。

en: An Englishman's home is his castle.
zh: 英国人的家就是他的城堡。

en: An Englishman would act in a different way.
zh: 一个英国人会以不同的方式行事。

en: An Englishman would not use such a word.
zh: 一个英国人不会使用这样的词。

en: Compared with the English, we are too near-sighted.
zh: 与英国人相比，我们太短视了。

en: An Englishman would not pronounce it like that.
zh: 一个英国人不会那样发音。

en: There are a lot of expressions used by English people.
zh: 英国人使用很多表达方式。

en: Not all English people like fish and chips.
zh: 并非所有英国人都喜欢炸鱼薯条。

en: The British Parliament is divided into the House of Commons and the House of Lords.
zh: 英国议会分为下议院和上议院。

en: The English Channel separates England and France.
zh: 英吉利海峡分隔了英国和法国。

en: British English differs from American English in many ways.
zh: 英国英语在很多方面与美国英语不同。

en: There are some differences between British English and American English.
zh: 英国英语和美国英语之间存在一些差异。

en: Take England for example.
zh: 以英国为例。

en: In British English, "to get the sack" means to be fired from your job.
zh: 在英国英语中，“to get the sack” 意味着被解雇。

en: Britain established many colonies.
zh: 英国建立了许多殖民地。

en: England is a land where the policemen carry no revolvers.
zh: 英国是一个警察不携带左轮手枪的国家。

en: England is a country that I've wanted to visit for a long time.
zh: 英国是一个我一直想去的国家。

en: No other English dramatist rivals Shakespeare.
zh: 没有其他英国剧作家能与莎士比亚匹敌。

en: The climate of England is similar to that of Hokkaido.
zh: 英国的气候与北海道的气候相似。

en: The climate of England is milder than that of Scotland.
zh: 英国的气候比苏格兰的气候温和。

en: British soccer fans sometimes get completely out of hand.
zh: 英国足球迷有时会完全失控。

en: Together with Britain, France may ban imports of waste from Germany.
zh: 法国可能与英国一起禁止从德国进口垃圾。

en: While in England I often consulted the guidebook.
zh: 在英国的时候，我经常查阅旅游指南。

en: When I was in England, I had great difficulty trouble in speaking English.
zh: 当我在英国时，我说英语非常困难。

en: The fact that Britain had no national anthem before 1745 is in itself of little consequence.
zh: 英国在1745年之前没有国歌这一事实本身无关紧要。

en: British and Japanese cars have steering wheels on the right side.
zh: 英国和日本的汽车方向盘都在右侧。

en: The political systems of Britain and Japan have a great deal in common.
zh: 英国和日本的政治制度有很多共同之处。

en: Who is the greatest poet in England?
zh: 谁是英国最伟大的诗人？

en: I hear the grass is green even in the winter in England.
zh: 我听说即使在冬天，英国的草也是绿色的。

en: The weather changes very often in England.
zh: 英国的天气变化非常频繁。

en: England resembles Japan in many respects.
zh: 英国在很多方面与日本相似。

en: In England they are supposed to keep to the left.
zh: 在英国，人们应该靠左行驶。

en: In England spring really begins with the first of May.
zh: 在英国，春天真正开始于五月一日。

en: They drive on the left in England.
zh: 在英国，他们靠左行驶。

en: In Britain they call the subway the underground.
zh: 在英国，他们把地铁叫做underground。

en: In Britain a truck is referred to as a lorry.
zh: 在英国，卡车被称为lorry。

en: Are the stores closed on Sunday in England?
zh: 在英国，商店星期天关门吗？

en: In England they have much rain at this time of the year.
zh: 在英国，每年的这个时候雨水很多。

en: I come from England.
zh: 我来自英国。

en: The voyage from England to India used to take 6 months.
zh: 从英国到印度的航程过去需要6个月。

en: You can't just come in here and start ordering people around.
zh: 你不能就这么进来，然后开始对别人发号施令。

en: I was discharged without notice.
zh: 我被解雇了，没有接到任何通知。

en: Ms Sato is no lightweight. I just saw her chug three bottles of beer.
zh: 佐藤女士可不是个弱者。我刚看到她一口气喝了三瓶啤酒。

en: Just wandering around can be a good way to travel.
zh: 只是四处闲逛也可能是一种很好的旅行方式。

en: Any amount of money will do.
zh: 多少钱都可以。

en: The most careful man sometimes makes mistakes.
zh: 再仔细的人有时也会犯错误。

en: You can see how much difference a few degrees can make.
zh: 你可以看到几度的差异能有多大的影响。

en: It's surprising how many unhappy marriages there are.
zh: 令人惊讶的是，竟然有这么多不幸的婚姻。

en: No matter how humble it may be, home is home.
zh: 无论多么简陋，家就是家。

en: How to live is the most important thing in life.
zh: 如何生活是人生中最重要的事情。

en: How to live is an important question for young people.
zh: 如何生活对年轻人来说是一个重要的问题。

en: No matter how learned one may be, he or she cannot be called a good person unless he or she has a sound mind.
zh: 无论一个人多么有学问，除非他或她有健全的思想，否则不能被称为一个好人。

en: That's Bill all over.
zh: 那是比尔一贯的作风。

en: Your clothes say "vacation resort" to me.
zh: 你的衣服给我的感觉是“度假胜地”。

en: A squid has ten arms.
zh: 鱿鱼有十条腕。

en: It's very important to know how to let off steam, living in this world.
zh: 生活在这个世界上，知道如何发泄是很重要的。

en: You can always count on Holmes in any emergency.
zh: 在任何紧急情况下，你都可以指望福尔摩斯。

en: No animal can exist without plants.
zh: 没有植物，任何动物都无法生存。

en: Any virtuous idea can be vicious in itself.
zh: 任何美德的思想本身都可能是邪恶的。

en: No student is allowed to enter the room.
zh: 不允许任何学生进入房间。

en: Any political party is conservative in itself.
zh: 任何政党本身都是保守的。

en: Under no circumstances will the princess succeed to the throne.
zh: 在任何情况下，公主都不会继承王位。

en: Under no circumstances must you leave the room.
zh: 在任何情况下，你都不能离开房间。

en: No action is in itself good or bad.
zh: 没有任何行为本身是好是坏。

en: No country should interfere in another country's internal affairs.
zh: 任何国家都不应干涉他国内政。

en: You had better not go.
zh: 你最好别去。

en: The raft has drifted far off from the shore.
zh: 木筏已经漂离岸边很远了。

en: It was an adventure going down the river on a raft.
zh: 乘木筏顺流而下是一次冒险。

en: Quit the snow job!
zh: 别再花言巧语了！

en: How is it with you?
zh: 你怎么样？

en: How do you like Texas so far?
zh: 你觉得德克萨斯怎么样？

en: No, thank you. I'm so full.
zh: 不用了，谢谢。我吃饱了。

en: And Jesus and his disciples had also been invited to the wedding.
zh: 耶稣和他的门徒也被邀请参加婚礼。

en: Jesus said, "You believe because I told you I saw you under the fig tree."
zh: 耶稣说：“你信是因为我告诉你我看见你在无花果树下。”

en: Jesus answered, "I tell you the truth."
zh: 耶稣回答说：“我实实在在地告诉你。”

en: Jesus wept.
zh: 耶稣哭了。

en: Turning around, Jesus saw them following and asked, "What do you want?"
zh: 耶稣转过身来，看见他们跟着，就问：“你们要什么？”

en: Jesus was born of Mary.
zh: 耶稣由玛丽所生。

en: When Jesus saw Nathanael approaching, he said of him, "Here truly is an Israelite in whom there is no deceit."
zh: 耶稣看见拿但业走过来，就指着他说：“看哪，这真是个以色列人，他心里没有诡诈。”

en: This, the first of the miraculous signs, Jesus performed in Cana in Galilee.
zh: 这是耶稣在加利利的迦拿所行的头一件神迹。

en: Jesus answered them.
zh: 耶稣回答他们。

en: When he saw Jesus passing by, he said...
zh: 他看见耶稣走过，就说...

en: Just say yes or no.
zh: 就说是或不是。

en: No no she is very naughty.
zh: 不不，她非常淘气。

en: No, you have to make a connecting flight in Chicago.
zh: 不，你需要在芝加哥转机。

en: To say is one thing, and to do quite another.
zh: 说是一回事，做又是另一回事。

en: It goes without saying that honesty is the best policy.
zh: 不用说，诚实是最好的策略。

en: I think we could be good friends.
zh: 我想我们可以成为好朋友。

en: What medicine do you recommend?
zh: 你推荐什么药？

en: Good riddance!
zh: 滚得好！

en: You got that one going in a good direction.
zh: 你把那件事做得很好。

en: Get yourself a decent suit.
zh: 给自己弄一套像样的西装。

en: At your age you should know better.
zh: 你这么大年纪应该懂事点。

en: It smells good!
zh: 闻起来很香！

en: Ah, this hot water's good!
zh: 啊，这热水真舒服！

en: You have a lot of nerve.
zh: 你真大胆。

en: He tried harder to get good marks than I did.
zh: 他比我更努力地想取得好成绩。

en: It looks as if it's going to be a nice day.
zh: 看起来天气会很好。

en: It is a nice day, isn't it?
zh: 今天天气真好，不是吗？

en: A nice day, isn't it? How about going for a swim?
zh: 天气真好，不是吗？去游泳怎么样？

en: Isn't it a lovely day!
zh: 今天天气真好啊！

en: It being fine, we went hiking yesterday.
zh: 因为天气好，我们昨天去徒步旅行了。

en: Since the weather is so good, can I open a window?
zh: 既然天气这么好，我可以开窗户吗？

en: We have good news.
zh: 我们有好消息。

en: You got yourself a nice guy.
zh: 你找了个好男人。

en: Hope you'll have a great one.
zh: 希望你过得愉快。

en: I think you're on the right track.
zh: 我认为你的方向是对的。

en: You have a nice line in doing your work.
zh: 你工作的方式很不错。

en: Let's go to the theater early so that we can get good seats.
zh: 我们早点去剧院，这样我们就能得到好座位。

en: He seems like quite a find.
zh: 他看起来是个难得的人才。

en: He is nice.
zh: 他人很好。

en: He is nice, but he's not the one for me.
zh: 他人很好，但不是我喜欢的那种类型。

en: I'm jealous that you have a good boss.
zh: 我嫉妒你有个好老板。

en: I'll get you a nice girl.
zh: 我会给你介绍个好女孩。

en: I'm very serious about wanting to be a good magician.
zh: 我非常认真地想成为一名优秀的魔术师。

en: I hit upon a good idea.
zh: 我突然想到一个好主意。

en: I was dealt a good hand.
zh: 我的运气不错。

en: Don't you think that's a good combination?
zh: 你不觉得这是个很好的组合吗？

en: It's not a good car, but it's a car.
zh: 这不是一辆好车，但它总归是辆车。

en: Did you buy a nice bicycle?
zh: 你买了辆不错的自行车吗？

en: You just take the rough with the smooth.
zh: 你必须接受好与坏。

en: If you are a good boy, you shall have a nice cake.
zh: 如果你是个好孩子，你就能得到一个好吃的蛋糕。

en: Behave yourself, or you'll have to leave the room.
zh: 好好表现，不然你就得离开房间。

en: If you are a good girl, you shall have candy.
zh: 如果你是个好女孩，你就能得到糖果。

en: Don't cry, there's a dear.
zh: 别哭了，乖。

en: Now be a good boy and go beddy-byes.
zh: 现在乖乖地去睡觉吧。

en: It seems to be becoming hard to get a good job.
zh: 现在好像越来越难找到好工作了。

en: A good idea came into my mind.
zh: 我脑海中浮现出一个好主意。

en: A good idea came into my head.
zh: 我脑海中浮现出一个好主意。

en: A good idea entered my mind.
zh: 我脑海中浮现出一个好主意。

en: I've got a good idea.
zh: 我有个好主意。

en: I'm looking forward to good news.
zh: 我期待着好消息。

en: I met him by happy accident.
zh: 我很幸运地遇到了他。

en: I'm getting happy.
zh: 我开始变得开心了。

en: Like a good wine, he improves with age.
zh: 他就像好酒一样，越老越醇。

en: It seems to be a good house.
zh: 这房子看起来不错。

en: Did you have a nice summer?
zh: 你夏天过得愉快吗？

en: Isn't it about time you went to bed?
zh: 你是不是该睡觉了？

en: Cut it out.
zh: 别闹了。

en: Open your eyes to reality.
zh: 睁开眼睛看看现实吧。

en: You will make a good wife.
zh: 你会成为一个好妻子的。

en: The seasoning is just right.
zh: 调味刚刚好。

en: It sounds great!
zh: 听起来很棒！

en: He is very bad at inventing excuses.
zh: 他很不擅长找借口。

en: Unless they have a good wine list, I don't want to eat here.
zh: 除非他们有好酒单，否则我不想在这里吃饭。

en: Sure, but don't take your time.
zh: 好的，但是别磨蹭。

en: Do you know a good restaurant?

en: Sure. What can I do?

en: No. He doesn't like water!
zh: 不，它不喜欢水！

en: No, I can't. I have to watch a baseball game on TV.
zh: 不，我不能。我要在电视上看棒球比赛。

en: No, I don't. What's he like?
zh: 不，我不知道。他怎么样？

en: A good specimen might weigh up to a kilo.
zh: 一个好的标本可能重达一公斤。

en: A good brandy completes a fine meal.
zh: 一杯上好的白兰地能为一顿美餐画上完美的句号。

en: You were lucky to find it.
zh: 你很幸运能找到它。

en: It was a nice party. You should have come, too.
zh: 那是个不错的派对。你也应该来的。

en: Sure. Do you know a good place?
zh: 好的。你知道有什么好地方吗？

en: Sure. What is it?
zh: 好的。是什么事？

en: Sure. That's a good idea.
zh: 好的。这是个好主意。

en: Sure. It's next to the Plaza Department Store.
zh: 好的，它就在 Plaza 百货商店旁边。

en: That's great. Nobody gives me anything.
zh: 太棒了，没人给我任何东西。

en: Let me tell you this. No one succeeded without making an effort.
zh: 我跟你说，没有人不经过努力就能成功的。

en: You see, I left school when I was thirteen.
zh: 你看，我十三岁就辍学了。

en: Yeast makes dough rise.
zh: 酵母使面团发酵。

en: Yeast acts as an agent in making bread rise.
zh: 酵母在面包发酵过程中起作用。

en: Yeast makes beer ferment.
zh: 酵母使啤酒发酵。

en: Let's go and watch the Easter parade.
zh: 我们去看复活节游行吧。

en: Happy Easter!
zh: 复活节快乐！

en: I'm painting Easter eggs.
zh: 我在画复活节彩蛋。

en: I learned a lot from what I heard.
zh: 我从我听到的东西中学到了很多。

en: I'll tell you a secret.
zh: 我告诉你一个秘密。

en: That's a nice coat.
zh: 这件外套真好看。

en: Did you have a nice Christmas?
zh: 你圣诞节过得愉快吗？

en: Don't pay any attention to the boss.
zh: 别理老板。

en: I bought a good camera.
zh: 我买了一个好相机。

en: Don't do the job just any old way.
zh: 别随便应付这份工作。

en: Stop pestering me. I'm busy.
zh: 别烦我了，我很忙。

en: Don't give me that!
zh: 别跟我来这套！

en: In other words, he is lazy.
zh: 换句话说，他很懒。

en: It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
zh: 今天天气真好，不是吗？

en: No. I went to Guam once on my honeymoon.
zh: 没有，我度蜜月的时候去过一次关岛。

en: No. I have been looking for them for more than one hour.
zh: 没有，我已经找它们一个多小时了。

en: No, I'm tired.
zh: 不，我累了。

en: No, it cannot be true.
zh: 不，这不可能是真的。

en: No, you need not.
zh: 不用了，你不需要。

en: No, I don't know.
zh: 不，我不知道。

en: No, she has never fallen in love.
zh: 不，她从来没有恋爱过。

en: No, I don't. I want to learn sometime.
zh: 不，我不喜欢。我想找时间学一下。

en: No. You have to buy it at the ticket office.
zh: 不行。你得去售票处买。

en: No, I don't think it will clear up.
zh: 不，我觉得天不会放晴。

en: Not at all.
zh: 一点也不。

en: No, she didn't.
zh: 不，她没有。

en: No, I don't think that I am to blame.
zh: 不，我不认为我应该受到责备。

en: No, I'm afraid not.
zh: 恐怕不行。

en: No, you need not go right now.
zh: 不用了，你现在不需要去。

en: No, I've never been there.
zh: 不，我从来没去过那里。

en: No, you don't.
zh: 不，你不是。

en: No, you won't.
zh: 不，你不会的。

en: No, he will not.
zh: 不，他不会的。

en: No, I'm not singing.
zh: 不，我没在唱歌。

en: No, I went out.
zh: 不，我出去了。

en: No, it gains ten minutes a day.
zh: 不，它每天快十分钟。

en: No, no, my dear.
zh: 不，不，亲爱的。

en: No, he has gone out for lunch already.
zh: 不，他已经出去吃午饭了。

en: No, I haven't written it yet.
zh: 不，我还没写完。

en: No problem. Come again soon.
zh: 没问题。欢迎下次再来。

en: No, I will go by bus.
zh: 不，我将乘公共汽车去。

en: No, please dial nine first.
zh: 不，请先拨九。

en: No, but I'll look it up in the dictionary.
zh: 不，但我会在字典里查一下。

en: No, but I play tennis.
zh: 不，但我打网球。

en: No, I don't. But I have a slight cold.
zh: 不，我没有。但我有点感冒。

en: No, but they might have them at our other store.
zh: 不，但是他们可能在我们其他的店里有。

en: No, thank you. I'm just looking.
zh: 不用了，谢谢。我只是看看。

en: No, you don't have to.
zh: 不，你不必这么做。

en: No, no, it's on me.
zh: 不，不，这算我的。

en: No, I don't. I want a room for tonight.
zh: 不，我没有。我想要一个今晚的房间。

en: No, thank you. I'm just looking around.
zh: 不用了，谢谢。我只是随便看看。

en: No, thank you. I've had enough.
zh: 不用了，谢谢。我吃饱了。

en: No, not how many toys, how many keys?
zh: 不，不是多少玩具，是多少钥匙？

en: No, not too much.
zh: 不，不要太多。

en: No, it's been delayed 45 minutes.
zh: 不，它已经延误了45分钟。

en: This is a great apartment.
zh: 这真是一套很棒的公寓。

en: I made Ann my secretary.
zh: 我让安当我的秘书。

en: Ammonia is a colorless liquid or gas with a very strong smell.
zh: 氨是一种无色的液体或气体，具有非常强烈的气味。

en: They were treating me so rudely that I suddenly just lost it.
zh: 他们对我太粗鲁了，我突然就崩溃了。

en: You shouldn't rely too heavily on the weather report.
zh: 你不应该太依赖天气预报。

en: Don't be so greedy.
zh: 别太贪心。

en: I have neglected you so long that I feel a bit shy in visiting you.
zh: 我疏忽你太久了，以至于拜访你时我感到有点不好意思。

en: Ann is exclusive in her choice of friends.
zh: 安在选择朋友方面很挑剔。

en: Anne is the envy of all her friends.
zh: 安妮是她所有朋友羡慕的对象。

en: Ann does not lack for friends.
zh: 安不缺朋友。

en: Ann sings elegantly.
zh: 安唱得很优雅。

en: Ann sang a lullaby for her little sister.
zh: 安为她的小妹妹唱了一首摇篮曲。

en: Ann has achieved her desired goal.
zh: 安已经实现了她想要的目标。

en: Ann seems to be ill.
zh: 安看起来好像病了。

en: Ann often plays tennis after school.
zh: 安经常放学后打网球。

en: Ann is said to be their leader.
zh: 据说安是他们的领导。

en: Ann apologized to her teacher for coming to school late.
zh: 安因为上学迟到向她的老师道歉。

en: Ann swam across the river.
zh: 安游过了河。

en: Ann is a little girl.
zh: 安是个小女孩。

en: Ann has a kind heart.
zh: 安有一颗善良的心。

en: Ann likes to write poems.
zh: 安喜欢写诗。

en: Anne will not come to our party.
zh: 安妮不会来参加我们的聚会。

en: Ann gave me this present.
zh: 安给了我这份礼物。

en: Ann can't find a job.
zh: 安找不到工作。

en: Anne is patiently knitting.
zh: 安妮耐心地织着毛衣。

en: Ann was in a hurry this morning.
zh: 安今天早上很匆忙。

en: Ann wrote something on the blackboard.
zh: 安在黑板上写了些东西。

en: Ann came downstairs.
zh: 安下了楼。

en: Ann must be dreaming a happy dream.
zh: 安一定在做一个美梦。

en: Anne will not accomplish anything.
zh: 安妮不会有任何成就。

en: Ann likes music very much.
zh: 安非常喜欢音乐。

en: Anne accepted Henry's proposal.
zh: 安妮接受了亨利的求婚。

en: Ann will not come to our party.
zh: 安妮不会来参加我们的聚会。

en: Ann was long coming.
zh: 安来得很晚。

en: Ann gave an account of how she had escaped.
zh: 安讲述了她是如何逃脱的。

en: Ann plays tennis very well.
zh: 安网球打得很好。

en: Ann has a weakness for chocolate.
zh: 安对巧克力没有抵抗力。

en: Ann is a cheerleader.
zh: 安是啦啦队长。

en: Ann has just finished writing her report.
zh: 安刚刚写完她的报告。

en: Ann bent her mind to the work.
zh: 安专心致志地工作。

en: Ann finished painting the picture.
zh: 安完成了这幅画的绘制。

en: Ann was surprised to hear the rumor.
zh: 安听到这个谣言感到很惊讶。

en: Ann has a little money with her.
zh: 安身上带了点钱。

en: I think Ann loves Jack.
zh: 我觉得安喜欢杰克。

en: I wonder when Anne will come.
zh: 我想知道安妮什么时候会来。

en: Ann always keeps her room clean.
zh: 安总是把她的房间保持得很干净。

en: It is said that Anne will get married in June.
zh: 据说安妮将在六月结婚。

en: Anne lived in terror of being captured by Nazis.
zh: 安妮生活在被纳粹抓捕的恐惧之中。

en: Which book did you pick out to send to Anne?
zh: 你挑了哪本书寄给安妮？

en: Be nice to Ann.
zh: 对安好一点。

en: I must apologize to Ann.
zh: 我必须向安道歉。

en: Ann had no friends to play with.
zh: 安没有朋友一起玩。

en: Ann has no sister.
zh: 安没有姐妹。

en: Anne has many admirers.
zh: 安妮有很多仰慕者。

en: I can't abide to see such fellows.
zh: 我无法忍受看到这样的人。

en: It is unlikely that such a cool headed person got upset.
zh: 像这样冷静的人不太可能心烦意乱。

en: I cannot abide such people.
zh: 我无法忍受这样的人。

en: I wish I had not bought such a useless thing.
zh: 我真希望我没有买这么没用的东西。

en: I'm sorry I was so rude.
zh: 对不起，我刚才太粗鲁了。

en: What am I supposed to say when he puts it so logically?
zh: 当他如此有逻辑地提出问题时，我该说什么呢？

en: You shouldn't have flown out like that.
zh: 你不应该那样突然离开。

en: He must be crazy to behave like that.
zh: 他一定是疯了才会那样做。

en: I don't talk to anyone who's that status-conscious.
zh: 我不和任何那么注重地位的人说话。

en: Don't take any notice of those rude boys.
zh: 别理那些没礼貌的男孩。

en: Those gloom and doom economists aren't worth their salt.
zh: 那些悲观的经济学家一文不值。

en: Getting shy Kyoko to talk at a party is like pulling teeth.
zh: 让害羞的京子在聚会上说话简直像拔牙一样困难。

en: You needn't have helped him with his work.
zh: 你本不必帮他做工作的。

en: Lending money to such a fellow is as good as throwing it away.
zh: 借钱给那种人简直等于把钱扔掉。

en: You're going to fall and sprain your ankle wearing sandals with such huge platforms.
zh: 你穿着这么厚的松糕凉鞋会摔倒扭伤脚踝的。

en: I like the sound of what he says, but it IS just talk, you know.
zh: 我喜欢他说的，但你知道，那只是说说而已。

en: I can't bear the sight of him.
zh: 我一看到他就受不了。

en: Don't have anything to do with him. He is completely untrustworthy.
zh: 不要和他有任何瓜葛。他完全不可信。

en: I did wrong in trusting such a fellow.
zh: 我真不该相信那种人。

en: He should be put in prison.
zh: 他应该被关进监狱。

en: He would sooner rather die than work for that man.
zh: 他宁愿死也不愿为那个人工作。

en: You are crazy to lend money to him.
zh: 你借钱给他真是疯了。

en: Don't go down before such a man.
zh: 不要向那种人低头。

en: How did you come to know such a wonderful girl?
zh: 你是怎么认识这么好的女孩的？

en: I can't hold with such a politician.
zh: 我无法认同这样的政客。

en: That politician put his foot in his mouth when he made those racist comments.
zh: 那位政客发表种族歧视言论真是失言了。

en: Don't associate with such people.
zh: 不要和那种人交往。

en: Don't get involved with those people.
zh: 不要和那些人有牵连。

en: There are few if any such kind men.
zh: 像他这样善良的人少之又少，甚至没有。

en: No one knows when such a custom first came into existence.
zh: 没有人知道这种习俗是什么时候开始出现的。

en: He cannot be a gentleman to say such a rude thing.
zh: 说出如此粗鲁的话，他不可能是个绅士。

en: He's completely shunned. I'm surprised he's still working here.
zh: 他完全被人避开了。我很惊讶他还在那儿工作。

en: He is fortunate having such a good wife.
zh: 他很幸运能有这么好的妻子。

en: Such behavior is beneath his dignity.
zh: 这种行为有损他的尊严。

en: Never did I see such a fool.
zh: 我从没见过这么蠢的人。

en: I cannot shed a tear for that horrible man.
zh: 我不会为那个可怕的男人流一滴眼泪。

en: It was stupid of me to make such a mistake.
zh: 我犯这么个错误真是太蠢了。

en: How foolish I was not to discover that simple lie!
zh: 我竟然没发现这么简单的谎言，我真是太傻了！

en: You ought not to have kept her waiting on such a cold night.
zh: 你真不该让她在这么冷的夜晚等候。

en: He'll have an accident one of these days if he keeps driving like that.
zh: 他要是继续那样开车，迟早会出事故的。

en: I can beat him hands down.
zh: 我可以轻易打败他。

en: If you trust such a fellow, you'll lose everything you have.
zh: 如果你信任那样的人，你会失去你的一切。

en: He must be a fool to talk like that.
zh: 他那样说话一定是傻瓜。

en: Anna married without the knowledge of her parents.
zh: 安娜瞒着父母结婚了。

en: I'll bet it gives her a feeling of superiority to be so beautiful.
zh: 我敢打赌，长得这么漂亮会让她有优越感。

en: It's unlike him to get so angry.
zh: 他很少这么生气。

en: You need not have come so early in the morning.
zh: 你本不必这么早来的。

en: With all her merits she was not proud.
zh: 她有这么多优点，却并不骄傲。

en: Never have I seen such a big whale.
zh: 我从未见过这么大的鲸鱼。

en: You must be a good athlete to have run a mile in such a short time.
zh: 你一定是个优秀的运动员，才能在这么短的时间内跑完一英里。

en: I can't apply my mind to anything with all that noise!
zh: 这么吵，我什么都无法专心！

en: Can he be ill when he runs around like that?
zh: 他跑来跑去，难道是生病了吗？

en: I've never heard English spoken so quickly.
zh: 我从没听过英语说得这么快。

en: It is fortunate that we should have met such kind people.
zh: 我们很幸运能遇到这么好的人。

en: Liking children the way she does Sue should become a teacher.
zh: 苏这么喜欢孩子，应该当一名老师。

en: I had never seen such an exciting baseball game before.
zh: 我以前从未看过这么精彩的棒球比赛。

en: I wish I hadn't seen such a horrible film.
zh: 我真希望我没看过这么恐怖的电影。

en: You are fortunate to have such loving parents.
zh: 你很幸运有这么有爱的父母。

en: I wish I hadn't spent so much money.
zh: 我真希望我没花那么多钱。

en: If I tried to wear shoes with heels that high, I'd sprain my ankle.
zh: 如果我试着穿那么高的高跟鞋，我会扭伤脚踝的。

en: I wish I had not spent so much money.
zh: 我真希望我没有花那么多钱。

en: Shame on you for getting so flustered. You looked ridiculous.
zh: 你太慌张了，真丢人。 你看起来很可笑。

en: I'd love to be able to wear a dress like that. But I'll have to lose some weight first.
zh: 我很想穿那样的裙子。 但我得先减掉一些体重。

en: She was the last person I had expected to see there.
zh: 她是我最意想不到会在那里见到的人。

en: It's quite absurd of you to tell her that sort of thing.
zh: 你跟她说那种事真是太荒谬了。

en: It's the first time that anybody said something like that to me.
zh: 这是第一次有人对我说这样的话。

en: It is courageous of you to say such a thing.
zh: 你说这样的话真勇敢。

en: You've got to be crazy to do something like that.
zh: 你做那样的事一定是疯了。

en: After what has happened, I dare not see her again.
zh: 发生了这样的事，我不敢再见她了。

en: You shouldn't have said such a thing to her.
zh: 你不应该对她说那样的话。

en: How long are you going to be seeing that loser of a boyfriend?
zh: 你还要和那个没出息的男朋友交往多久？

en: It's hard to complain against such good people.
zh: 很难抱怨这么好的人。

en: The number of errors of fact in Arendt's book are considerably fewer than Abel implies.
zh: 阿伦特书中事实错误的数量比艾贝尔暗示的要少得多。

en: It seems Ann and Zachary ran off together.
zh: 看来安和扎卡里私奔了。

en: Andersen was afraid of dogs, too.
zh: 安徒生也怕狗。

en: I was looking for Andy. Do you know where he is?
zh: 我在找安迪。 你知道他在哪里吗？

en: Andy is never late for a date.
zh: 安迪约会从不迟到。

en: Andy must have practiced very hard.
zh: 安迪一定是练习得很努力。

en: Andy hung his shirt up in the closet.
zh: 安迪把衬衫挂在衣橱里。

en: Andy is master of French and German.
zh: 安迪精通法语和德语。

en: Oh, and Andy Dillon called...
zh: 哦，还有安迪·狄龙来过电话...

en: You've got the wrong station.
zh: 你调错频道了。

en: What know you of patience?
zh: 你懂什么叫耐心？

en: You came when I was thirty.
zh: 你来的时候我三十岁。

en: You can't be hungry. You had a snack a few minutes ago.
zh: 你不可能饿。你几分钟前才吃了零食。

en: You have a good camera.
zh: 你有个好相机。

en: If you dress like that at your age, you'll make a fool of yourself.
zh: 你这把年纪还穿成那样，会闹笑话的。

en: I am afraid your watch is two minutes slow.
zh: 恐怕你的表慢了两分钟。

en: Everybody except the Anderson family is going to the party next Thursday evening.
zh: 除了安德森一家，下周四晚上大家都去参加聚会。

en: Why are you with a pig?
zh: 你为什么和一头猪在一起？

en: What are you lining up for?
zh: 你们在排队做什么？

en: Anthony was esteemed by the Egyptians.
zh: 安东尼受到埃及人的尊敬。

en: The apricot trees are in full blossom.
zh: 杏树正值盛花期。

en: Angola was once a Portuguese territory.
zh: 安哥拉曾经是葡萄牙的领土。

en: The questionnaires were distributed at random.
zh: 问卷是随机分发的。

en: The questionnaire form was distributed properly.
zh: 问卷表格已正确分发。

en: I love Ann all the more because she is shy.
zh: 我更爱安妮，因为她很害羞。

en: Ann cannot be playing the piano.
zh: 安妮不可能在弹钢琴。

en: Is the rumor that Anne will get married to John true?
zh: 安妮要和约翰结婚的谣言是真的吗？

en: Either Ann or Carol is going to take care of the baby.
zh: 安妮或卡罗尔会照顾婴儿。

en: Huh? What is this? They're not going to use my proposal?
zh: 哈？这是什么？他们不打算采用我的提案吗？

en: Being a hasty person, he is likely to jump to conclusions.
zh: 他是个性急的人，很可能会草率下结论。

en: Being written in great haste, this letter has quite a few mistakes.
zh: 这封信写得很匆忙，所以有很多错误。

en: Marry in haste, and repent at leisure.
zh: 草率结婚，后悔莫及。

en: You should grab your bag and hurry home.
zh: 你应该拿起你的包，赶紧回家。

en: It's better to take your time at this job than to hurry and make mistakes.
zh: 做这份工作最好慢慢来，不要着急犯错。

en: Hasty marriage seldom succeeds.
zh: 草率的婚姻很少成功。

en: What's that?
zh: 那是什么？

en: I have heard nothing from him since then.
zh: 从那以后我就没收到他的消息。

en: Nothing can be worse than that.
zh: 没有比那更糟糕的了。

en: I have had a series of misfortunes since then.
zh: 从那以后，我一直很不顺。

en: Will you introduce me to the young woman talking with Mrs. Allen?
zh: 你能把我介绍给和艾伦太太说话的那位年轻女士吗？

en: Allen was given a problem that was impossible to solve.
zh: 艾伦被给了一个不可能解决的问题。

en: Can I see that one?
zh: 我可以看看那个吗？

en: Do you have any allergies?
zh: 你有什么过敏症吗？

en: I have allergic rhinitis.
zh: 我有过敏性鼻炎。

en: Those are their books.

zh: 它们被竖立起来是为了纪念某个事件或讲述一个祖先的传说。

en: If a tree dies, plant another in its place.
zh: 如果一棵树死了，就在它的位置上种另一棵。

en: Certain poisons, properly used, are useful.
zh: 某些毒药，如果使用得当，是有用的。

en: Some animals can sense the coming of a storm.
zh: 有些动物能感觉到暴风雨的来临。

en: Certain animals are fast disappearing.
zh: 某些动物正在迅速消失。

en: Some kinds of birds can't fly.
zh: 有些种类的鸟不会飞。

en: We can conjecture that it may be advantageous for a particular bird to be known to its neighbors or its mate.
zh: 我们可以推测，对于某只特定的鸟来说，被它的邻居或配偶所知可能是有利的。

en: Some kinds of food make one thirsty.
zh: 有些种类的食物会让人口渴。

en: The prices of certain foods vary from week to week.
zh: 某些食物的价格每周都在变化。

en: Some plants cannot adapt themselves to the cold.
zh: 有些植物不能适应寒冷。

en: That kind of behavior is characteristic of the boy.
zh: 那种行为是那个男孩的特征。

en: In one letter he remarks, "Life is but a dream".
zh: 在一封信中，他写道：“人生如梦”。

en: What is right in one society can be wrong in another.
zh: 在一个社会中正确的事情在另一个社会中可能是错误的。

en: I got hurt during an experiment, and the injury was pretty serious.
zh: 我在一次实验中受伤了，而且伤势相当严重。

en: There have always been fashionable faces and expressions which marked an epoch.
zh: 总有一些时尚的面孔和表情标志着一个时代。

en: The museums are full of objects which the most cultivated taste of a period considered beautiful, but which seem to us now worthless.
zh: 博物馆里充满了那些在一个时期内被最有教养的品味认为是美丽的，但现在在我们看来毫无价值的物品。

en: The best way to know what a country is like is to go and see it with your own eyes.
zh: 了解一个国家是什么样子的最好方法就是亲自去看看。

en: If you are to know a nation, you must learn its history.
zh: 如果你想了解一个国家，你必须学习它的历史。

en: When I first visit a country, I always try to share a meal with the people there.
zh: 当我第一次访问一个国家时，我总是尽量和那里的人们一起吃饭。

en: The manners and customs of a country reflect its culture.
zh: 一个国家的礼仪和习俗反映了它的文化。

en: As soon as one airline announced its plan for airfare reductions, the rest of the companies followed suit.
zh: 一旦一家航空公司宣布了其降低机票价格的计划，其余的公司都纷纷效仿。

en: An idea came to me.
zh: 我突然有了一个想法。

en: A certain door-to-door salesman made a fool of a trusting old lady and went off with a lot of her money.
zh: 一个挨家挨户推销的推销员欺骗了一位信任人的老妇人，卷走了她的大笔钱。

en: There lived a king in an old castle.
zh: 从前，在一座古老的城堡里住着一位国王。

en: A study reports that 53,000 Americans die each year as a result of secondhand smoke.
zh: 一项研究报告称，每年有53,000名美国人死于二手烟。

en: According to a study, big women are more prone to have twins.
zh: 一项研究表明，身材高大的女性更容易生双胞胎。

en: A study shows lung cancer accounts for 17% of women's cancer deaths.
zh: 一项研究表明，肺癌占女性癌症死亡人数的17%。

en: One professor says that even if Alex is using words, it's wrong to call it a language.
zh: 一位教授说，即使亚历克斯在使用词语，称其为一种语言也是错误的。

en: A generous man contributed some two billion yen to charity.
zh: 一位慷慨的人向慈善机构捐赠了约20亿日元。

en: A strange idea sprang up in my mind.
zh: 一个奇怪的想法突然出现在我的脑海中。

en: I'm going to see some student.
zh: 我要去见几个学生。

en: A scholar made an excellent speech about human rights.
zh: 一位学者就人权发表了精彩的演讲。

en: A foreigner asked me where the station was.
zh: 一个外国人问我车站在哪里。

en: One Tuesday I stayed home because I had an appointment with the dentist later in the morning.
zh: 一个星期二，我呆在家里，因为那天上午晚些时候我与牙医有约。

en: A song says a girl's mind is variable.
zh: 一首歌唱道，女孩的心思是多变的。

en: The movie director was enchanted by Kate at first sight.
zh: 电影导演对凯特一见钟情。

en: One rainy morning I woke up to find myself famous.
zh: 一个下雨的早晨，我醒来发现自己出名了。

en: One rainy evening he was driving a car.
zh: 一个下雨的傍晚，他正在开车。

en: In a sense what he says is true.
zh: 从某种意义上说，他说的是真的。

en: On a rainy morning he left his house early so as to be in time for school.
zh: 在一个下雨的早晨，他很早就离开了家，以便及时赶到学校。

en: In a way you are right, but I still have doubts.
zh: 在某种程度上你是对的，但我仍然有疑问。

en: In a sense, it is true.
zh: 从某种意义上说，这是真的。

en: Polite language, in a sense, spoils a casual atmosphere.
zh: 从某种意义上说，客套话破坏了轻松的气氛。

en: In a sense, life is only a dream.
zh: 从某种意义上说，人生只是一场梦。

en: In a way, what your friend has said is true.
zh: 在某种程度上，你朋友说的是真的。

en: In a sense, you are wrong.
zh: 从某种意义上说，你是错的。

en: In a sense, such a political movement may be called a revolution.
zh: 从某种意义上说，这样的政治运动可以被称为一场革命。

en: In a sense, you are right.
zh: 从某种意义上说，你是对的。

en: In a way, you're wrong.
zh: 在某种程度上，你是错的。

en: In a sense, life is but a dream.
zh: 从某种意义上说，人生如梦。

en: In a way, Susie seems like my mother.
zh: 在某种程度上，苏西看起来像我的母亲。

en: It was said that a great poet had resided here.
zh: 据说一位伟大的诗人曾居住于此。

en: If you turn a blind eye to something, you ignore it.
zh: 如果你对某事视而不见，那就是你忽略了它。

en: I like Alpine skiing better than Nordic skiing.
zh: 我喜欢高山滑雪胜过北欧滑雪。

en: You have to be outside something, able to experience it from a distance, before it makes sense.
zh: 你必须置身事外，能够从远处体验它，它才有意义。

en: Alfred was made captain of the team.
zh: 阿尔弗雷德被任命为队长。

en: The Alps are in the center of Europe.
zh: 阿尔卑斯山位于欧洲中部。

en: The scenery of the Alps left a lasting impression on me.
zh: 阿尔卑斯山的风景给我留下了深刻的印象。

en: Say the alphabet backwards.
zh: 倒着说字母表。

en: Write the alphabet in capitals.
zh: 用大写字母写字母表。

en: How many letters are there in the alphabet?
zh: 字母表里有多少个字母？

en: The alphabet consists of 26 letters.
zh: 字母表由26个字母组成。

en: 'A' comes before 'B' in the alphabet.
zh: 在字母表中，'A'在'B'之前。

en: In the alphabet, B comes after A.
zh: 在字母表中，B在A之后。

en: Will you show me your photo album?
zh: 你能给我看看你的相册吗？

en: An alpaca looks like a horse and a camel.
zh: 羊驼看起来像马和骆驼。

en: Today is my second day of my side job.
zh: 今天是我做兼职的第二天。

en: I'll have to find a part-time job.
zh: 我得找一份兼职工作。

en: Working part-time, I found that some customers were polite, whereas others were not.
zh: 通过兼职，我发现有些顾客很有礼貌，而另一些则不然。

en: I have no job, so I can never save money.
zh: 我没有工作，所以我永远存不了钱。

en: I think a part-time job is a good experience.
zh: 我认为兼职工作是一种很好的经历。

en: I made a lot of money on the side.
zh: 我赚了很多外快。

en: Albert is quick at learning.
zh: 阿尔伯特学东西很快。

en: Albert is the last person to break a promise.
zh: 阿尔伯特是最不可能违背承诺的人。

en: Albert is engaged in foreign trade and often goes abroad.
zh: 阿尔伯特从事对外贸易，经常出国。

en: Albert, I hope you'll stand by me if I get in trouble.
zh: 阿尔伯特，如果我遇到麻烦，我希望你能支持我。

en: The amount of time someone is willing to spend on something may communicate how important it is to him.
zh: 一个人愿意花在某件事上的时间可能表明这件事对他有多重要。

en: Don't drink any alcohol.
zh: 不要喝任何酒。

en: Do you have any non-alcoholic drinks?
zh: 你们有什么不含酒精的饮料吗？

en: An alcoholic tends not to die happily.
zh: 酗酒者往往不得善终。

en: Do you have anything non-alcoholic?
zh: 你们有什么不含酒精的饮料吗？

en: Alcohol consumption is increasing every year.
zh: 每年的酒精消费量都在增加。

en: He was under the influence of alcohol when he crashed his car.
zh: 他酒后驾车撞毁了他的车。

en: Alcohol has done great mischief to his body.
zh: 酒精对他的身体造成了很大的损害。

en: Alcohol is beginning to tell on his speech.
zh: 酒精开始影响他的说话能力了。

en: Does ALC's web site include an archive of English expressions?
zh: ALC的网站是否包含英语表达的存档？

en: Life as it is is very uninteresting to him.
zh: 他觉得现在的生活很无聊。

en: Perhaps that's true.
zh: 也许那是真的。

en: Try to see things as they are.
zh: 试着如实看待事物。

en: There is a curious story about an Englishman.
zh: 有一个关于英国人的奇特故事。

en: One American scientist, William Keeton, used a very interesting experiment to solve this mystery.
zh: 一位美国科学家威廉·基顿用一个非常有趣的实验来解开这个谜团。

en: One sunny day in April, I went out for a walk.
zh: 四月的一个阳光明媚的日子，我出去散步。

en: A 19-year-old Canadian broke the world record last month for a nonstop, round-trip swim across the English Channel.
zh: 一位19岁的加拿大人上个月打破了横渡英吉利海峡的往返不间断游泳世界纪录。

en: All the money is lost.
zh: 所有的钱都丢了。

en: There is one, but it's a little far.
zh: 有一个，但是有点远。

en: This is just another day.
zh: 这只是又一天而已。

en: We often hear it said that ants are social animals.
zh: 我们经常听到人说蚂蚁是群居动物。

en: Ants work away during summer.
zh: 蚂蚁在夏天辛勤工作。

en: The alibi points to her innocence.
zh: 不在场证明表明她是无辜的。

en: Don't think little of the ants' lives.
zh: 不要小看蚂蚁的生命。

en: Sysko works like an ant.
zh: Sysko像蚂蚁一样工作。

en: It is difficult to tell the bare facts.
zh: 很难说出赤裸裸的事实。

en: Ants have a well-organized society.
zh: 蚂蚁拥有一个组织良好的社会。

en: I spent all the savings I had on this.
zh: 我把所有的积蓄都花在了这上面。

en: I gave her all the money I had.
zh: 我把所有的钱都给她了。

en: Alice has a flower on her head.
zh: 爱丽丝头上戴着一朵花。

en: Alice slid down the long slide.
zh: 爱丽丝滑下了长长的滑梯。

en: Alice hung her head in shame.
zh: 爱丽丝羞愧地低下了头。

en: Alice rushed into her room.
zh: 爱丽丝冲进了她的房间。

en: Alice wasn't listening to her sister.
zh: 爱丽丝没有听她妹妹说话。

en: Alice was frightened of her strict mother.
zh: 爱丽丝害怕她严厉的母亲。

en: Alice wears a sweet perfume.
zh: 爱丽丝喷了甜美的香水。

en: Alice wasn't present at the meeting, was she?
zh: 爱丽丝没有出席会议，是吗？

en: Alice smiled.
zh: 爱丽丝笑了。

en: Alice may possibly come.
zh: 爱丽丝可能会来。

en: Alice returned home early from work with a severe headache.
zh: 爱丽丝因为严重的头痛提前从工作岗位回家了。

en: Alice didn't see the dog.
zh: 爱丽丝没有看到那条狗。

en: It seems that Alice is very pleased with the suit.
zh: 看来爱丽丝对这套西装很满意。

en: Alice has had a cold since last Sunday.
zh: 爱丽丝从上周日开始就感冒了。

en: Alice went to bed at ten.
zh: 爱丽丝十点钟上床睡觉了。

en: Alice, not knowing where to find the book, asked her mother where it was.
zh: 爱丽丝不知道在哪里能找到那本书，就问她妈妈书在哪里。

en: Alice might have been there yesterday, but we didn't see her.
zh: 爱丽丝昨天可能在那里，但我们没见到她。

en: The green color becomes Alice.
zh: 绿色很衬爱丽丝。

en: It was to the concert that Alice went yesterday.
zh: 昨天是爱丽丝去听音乐会。

en: I think it strange that Alice should keep silence for such a long time.
zh: 爱丽丝这么长时间保持沉默，我觉得很奇怪。

en: John broke in as Alice was speaking.
zh: 爱丽丝说话的时候，约翰打断了她。

en: It was yesterday that Alice went to a concert.
zh: 爱丽丝是昨天去听音乐会的。

en: Ants are swarming around the sugar.
zh: 蚂蚁正在糖周围聚集。

en: We shot our wad.
zh: 我们孤注一掷了。

en: Thank you, brothers.
zh: 谢谢你们，兄弟们。

en: Thanks, but no thanks.
zh: 谢谢，不过不用了。

en: You might at least say "thank you."
zh: 你至少应该说声“谢谢”。

en: Thank you. I used to play tennis in high school.
zh: 谢谢。我高中时经常打网球。

en: Thanks. Maybe we'll come back.
zh: 谢谢。也许我们会再来的。

en: Thanks. When you get off work, we'll go to my place for another.
zh: 谢谢。你下班后，我们再去我家再来一局。

en: Thanks, Yukina.
zh: 谢谢你，雪菜。

en: Thank you, I've had enough.
zh: 谢谢，我吃饱了。

en: I'm fine, too, thank you.
zh: 我也很好，谢谢。

en: I appreciate it, but I think I shouldn't.
zh: 我很感谢，但我想我不应该。

en: I have more than enough time.
zh: 我的时间绰绰有余。

en: Nobody likes to be found fault with.
zh: 没有人喜欢被人挑毛病。

en: Ah, we have run short of sugar.
zh: 啊，我们的糖不够了。

en: Alan Tate and I looked at one another for a while.
zh: 艾伦·泰特和我互相看了对方一会儿。

en: Everything is subject to the laws of nature.
zh: 一切都受自然规律支配。

en: What is a cynic? A man who knows the price of everything, and the value of nothing.
zh: 什么是愤世嫉俗者？一个知道所有东西的价格，却不知道任何东西的价值的人。

en: Every insult was put on him.
zh: 他受到了各种侮辱。

en: All inventions grow out of necessity.
zh: 所有的发明都源于需求。

en: Research revealed that the same high truancy levels were to be found in every inner city district.
zh: 研究表明，每个内城区的旷课率都很高。

en: We are surprised to see how every creature lives.
zh: 我们惊讶地看到每种生物是如何生存的。

en: All the truth is not to be told at all time.
zh: 并非所有真相都可以在任何时候说出来。

en: People in every walk of life go to church.
zh: 各行各业的人都去教堂。

en: Jack of all trades is master of none.
zh: 样样通，样样松。

en: I've looked everywhere, but I can't find my wallet.
zh: 我到处都找过了，但我找不到我的钱包。

en: People everywhere yearn for public leaders dedicated to world peace.
zh: 世界各地的人们都渴望有致力于世界和平的公众领袖。

en: All sorts of people came to the exhibition.
zh: 各种各样的人都来看展览。

en: Every situation requires individual analysis.
zh: 每种情况都需要单独分析。

en: Taking all things into consideration, his conduct can be excused.
zh: 考虑到所有因素，他的行为是可以原谅的。

en: Everything concurred to make him happy.
zh: 一切都使他感到快乐。

en: All things considered, he is a good teacher.
zh: 总的来说，他是一位好老师。

en: Taking everything into consideration, the result is better than I expected.
zh: 考虑到一切，结果比我预期的要好。

en: Every child objects to being treated like a baby.
zh: 每个孩子都反对被当成婴儿对待。

en: It is essential that every child have the same educational opportunities.
zh: 每个孩子都拥有相同的教育机会至关重要。

en: The history of every country begins in the heart of a man or a woman.
zh: 每个国家的历史都始于一个男人或女人的心中。

en: Every cause produces more than one effect.
zh: 每个原因都会产生不止一个结果。

en: Regard all art critics as useless and dangerous.
zh: 把所有的艺术评论家都看作是无用和危险的。

en: You must avail yourself of every opportunity.
zh: 你必须利用每一个机会。

en: You should avail yourself of every opportunity.
zh: 你应该利用每一个机会。

en: Every opportunity is used, and you should do English practice.
zh: 每个机会都被利用了，你应该做英语练习。

en: Try to make the most of every opportunity.
zh: 尽量充分利用每一个机会。

en: We tried all means possible.
zh: 我们尝试了所有可能的手段。

en: All possible means have been tried.
zh: 所有可能的手段都已尝试过了。

en: There is a limit to everything.
zh: 凡事都有个限度。

en: I have looked everywhere, but I can not find my wallet.
zh: 我到处都找过了，但是找不到我的钱包。

en: All things taken into consideration, my father's life was a happy one.
zh: 总而言之，我父亲的一生是幸福的。

en: All things considered, he led a happy life.
zh: 总的来说，他过着幸福的生活。

en: I think everything is going well.
zh: 我觉得一切进展顺利。

en: The most important feature of all games is that they are governed by rules.
zh: 所有游戏中最重要的特点是它们都受规则约束。

en: Yecch. This rice cracker is soggy.
zh: 哎呀。这个米饼都软了。

en: I can't read Arabic script.
zh: 我看不懂阿拉伯文字。

en: The Arabic script was replaced by the Roman alphabet.
zh: 阿拉伯文字被罗马字母取代了。

en: Arabic is a very important language.
zh: 阿拉伯语是一门非常重要的语言。

en: Arabic is written from right to left.
zh: 阿拉伯语是从右向左书写的。

en: Arabia abounds in oil.
zh: 阿拉伯盛产石油。

en: They keep lambs for meat in Arabia.
zh: 他们在阿拉伯养羊是为了吃肉。

en: A new difficulty presented itself.
zh: 出现了一个新的困难。

en: In Alaska you can see natural phenomena like the aurora, right?
zh: 在阿拉斯加你可以看到像极光这样的自然现象，对吧？

en: The storm blew for two days.
zh: 暴风刮了两天。

en: The storm abated.
zh: 暴风雨减弱了。

en: The oak tree remained standing after the storm.
zh: 暴风雨过后，橡树仍然屹立着。

en: The storm laid the village flat.
zh: 暴风雨把村庄夷为平地。

en: Oh, I'm sorry. I guess I have the wrong number.
zh: 哦，对不起。我想我打错电话了。

en: You should have telephoned in advance.
zh: 你应该事先打电话。

en: We ought to have phoned ahead and reserved a table.
zh: 我们应该提前打电话预订一张桌子。

en: Let's get things ready beforehand.
zh: 我们事先把东西准备好。

en: Please let me know the schedule beforehand.
zh: 请事先告诉我日程安排。

en: Oh, no! I forgot to punch in again!
zh: 哦，不！我又忘了打卡了！

en: Oh dear! I'm short of money.
zh: 哎呀！我缺钱了。

en: Oh, just the usual stuff.
zh: 哦，还是一些老样子。

en: Oh, I can hear you clearly.
zh: 哦，我能听清楚你说话。

en: Wow, you're dressed to kill.
zh: 哇，你打扮得真漂亮。

en: Oh, please call me Angela.
zh: 哦，请叫我安吉拉。

en: Oh your daughter Haru-chan is very cheerful.
zh: 哦，你的女儿春春非常活泼开朗。

en: She fumbled with a piece of paper.
zh: 她笨手笨脚地摆弄着一张纸。

en: Aya tends to carry things to extremes.
zh: 绫倾向于把事情做得过火。

en: Aya likes intense colors, such as hot pink, electric blue and deep purple.
zh: 绫喜欢鲜艳的颜色，比如亮粉色、电光蓝和深紫色。

en: I nearly made a mistake.
zh: 我差点犯了个错误。

en: Aya has good reason to speak perfect German.
zh: 绫有充分的理由说一口流利的德语。

en: In American culture, speech is golden.
zh: 在美国文化中，说话很重要。

en: The President of the U.S. paid a formal visit to China.
zh: 美国总统对中国进行了正式访问。

en: The American Ambassador was invited to the gathering.
zh: 美国大使应邀参加了聚会。

en: A lot of people were out of work during the Great Depression in America.
zh: 在美国大萧条时期，很多人失业。

en: He was the last person I had expected to see during my stay in America.
zh: 他是我在美国逗留期间最不希望见到的人。

en: The ancestors of Native Americans went to the continent from Asia by way of the Bering Strait.
zh: 美洲原住民的祖先通过白令海峡从亚洲来到这片大陆。

en: Born in America, Taro speaks good English.
zh: 太郎出生在美国，英语说得很好。

en: The American Government declared a state of emergency.
zh: 美国政府宣布进入紧急状态。

en: Two traits of Americans are generosity and energy.
zh: 美国人的两个特点是慷慨和精力充沛。

en: Americans pay both federal taxes and state taxes.
zh: 美国人既要缴纳联邦税，也要缴纳州税。

en: The Americans are a democratic people.
zh: 美国人是民主的人民。

en: Americans have the right to bear arms.
zh: 美国人有权携带武器。

en: Americans eat a lot of meat.
zh: 美国人吃很多肉。

en: Americans may regard shy people as less capable than those who are not shy.
zh: 美国人可能认为害羞的人不如不害羞的人有能力。

en: Americans are very friendly people.
zh: 美国人非常友善。

en: Many Americans like fast cars.
zh: 很多美国人喜欢跑车。

en: The Americans are an aggressive people.
zh: 美国人是一个有进取心的民族。

en: Americans spend most of their lives working, being productive.
zh: 美国人一生中的大部分时间都在工作，力求有所作为。

en: Americans spend much of their free time at home.
zh: 美国人大部分空闲时间都在家里度过。

en: Americans are frank enough to say what they think.
zh: 美国人很坦率，想说什么就说什么。

en: Americans on the whole are a talkative people.
zh: 总的来说，美国人很健谈。

en: What are Americans overlooking?
zh: 美国人忽略了什么？

en: Americans, in general, don't like to dress up.
zh: 一般来说，美国人不喜欢盛装打扮。

en: Americans admire Lincoln for his honesty.
zh: 美国人钦佩林肯的诚实。

en: Americans called frankfurters "dachshund sausages."
zh: 美国人把法兰克福香肠叫做“腊肠”。

en: Americans participate in most sports.
zh: 美国人参与大多数运动。

en: I hear that Americans spell it l-a-b-o-r.
zh: 我听说美国人把劳动拼写成l-a-b-o-r。

en: The Americans had nothing to do with the matter.
zh: 这件事与美国人无关。

en: With an American father and a French mother, she is bilingual.
zh: 她有一个美国父亲和一个法国母亲，会说两种语言。

en: Some Americans have grave debts.
zh: 有些美国人负债累累。

en: As is often the case with Americans, he does not care for raw fish.
zh: 和很多美国人一样，他不喜欢生鱼。

en: To Americans, a Japanese baby seems to have no privacy.
zh: 对美国人来说，日本婴儿似乎没有任何隐私。

en: How would you know an American from an Englishman?
zh: 你如何区分美国人和英国人？

en: He doesn't seem to be an American.
zh: 他看起来不像美国人。

en: I, as an American, admire Lincoln.
zh: 作为一名美国人，我钦佩林肯。

en: Just as the Americans like baseball, the British like cricket.
zh: 正如美国人喜欢棒球一样，英国人喜欢板球。

en: Americans accumulated their trade deficits by living far beyond their means.
zh: 美国人由于生活远超出他们的经济能力而积累了贸易逆差。

en: If the Americans had had less influence on affairs, war might well have been avoided.
zh: 如果美国人对事务的影响力小一些，战争很可能就可以避免。

en: The Americans don't accept Fascism any more than they do Communism.
zh: 美国人既不接受法西斯主义，也不接受共产主义。

en: A girl from America is in our class.
zh: 我们班里有个美国女孩。

en: The first immigrants in American history came from England and the Netherlands.
zh: 美国历史上第一批移民来自英国和荷兰。

en: We met in the American history class.

en: The USA is a good market for Japanese products.
zh: 美国是日本产品的好市场。

en: The United States is a large country.
zh: 美国是一个大国。

en: The United States is a republic.
zh: 美国是一个共和国。

en: The United States seems to have got caught up in the troubles between the three nations in Asia.
zh: 美国似乎卷入了亚洲三国之间的争端。

en: The USA is composed of 50 states.
zh: 美国由50个州组成。

en: My fellow Americans: ask not what your country can do for you; ask what you can do for your country.
zh: 我的美国同胞们：不要问你的国家能为你做什么，而要问你能为你的国家做什么。

en: The economic strength of the USA is not what it was.
zh: 美国的经济实力已不如从前。

en: There are fifty states in the United States.
zh: 美国有五十个州。

en: He went to Europe by way of America.
zh: 他经由美国去了欧洲。

en: The U.S. economy is the largest in the world.
zh: 美国经济是世界上最大的经济体。

en: The U.S. economy is in good health.
zh: 美国经济状况良好。

en: The American economy is in solid shape.
zh: 美国经济状况稳固。

en: The U.S. economy shrugged off the '87 Crash.
zh: 美国经济摆脱了87年股灾的影响。

en: CEO's of American corporations are paid several times their Japanese counterparts.
zh: 美国公司首席执行官的薪酬是日本同行的好几倍。

en: You shall not use this form while speaking American English.
zh: 说美式英语时，你不得使用这种形式。

en: I prefer French films to American ones.
zh: 我喜欢法国电影胜过美国电影。

en: American films are more popular than those of any other country.
zh: 美国电影比任何其他国家的电影都更受欢迎。

en: I'm crazy about American football.
zh: 我非常喜欢美式橄榄球。

en: In American football the defense has a specific job.
zh: 在美式橄榄球中，防守有特定的任务。

en: Do you accept AMEX?
zh: 你们接受美国运通卡吗？

en: You can fly across America in about five hours.
zh: 你可以在大约五个小时内飞越美国。

en: I have no time to go to America.
zh: 我没有时间去美国。

en: Are we losing a day on the way to America?
zh: 我们去美国的路上会少一天吗？

en: If you are going to America, brush up your English.
zh: 如果你要去美国，就好好复习一下英语。

en: If you are to go to America, you had better learn English conversation.
zh: 如果你要去美国，最好学好英语会话。

en: You might as well stay at home as go to America.
zh: 你去美国还不如待在家里。

en: Do you have any special reason why you want to go to America?
zh: 你有什么特别的理由想去美国吗？

en: A trip to America this summer is out of the question.
zh: 今年夏天去美国旅行是不可能的。

en: A trip to America is out of the question.
zh: 去美国旅行是不可能的。

en: A trip to America was equivalent to a two-year salary for her.
zh: 去美国旅行相当于她两年的工资。

en: The voyage to America used to take many weeks.
zh: 过去去美国的航程要花好几个星期。

en: America is a country on the move.
zh: 美国是一个不断发展的国家。

en: America did away with slavery.
zh: 美国废除了奴隶制。

en: America is second to none in natural resources.
zh: 美国在自然资源方面首屈一指。

en: America abounds in oil.
zh: 美国盛产石油。

en: The U.S. is calling for an arms embargo against violators of the treaty.
zh: 美国呼吁对违反该条约的国家实行武器禁运。

en: Americans eat lots of wheat, rye and other grains.
zh: 美国人吃大量的麦子、黑麦和其他谷物。

en: America is proud of being a free country.
zh: 美国以成为一个自由国家而自豪。

en: America will solve her problems for herself.
zh: 美国将自己解决自己的问题。

en: America likes to claim that it is a "classless" society.
zh: 美国喜欢声称自己是一个“无阶级”社会。

en: The USA will only use air strikes in the country as a last resort.
zh: 美国只有在万不得已的情况下才会对该国进行空袭。

en: America is a large country and its people are mobile.
zh: 美国是一个大国，人民流动性很大。

en: America is ahead in space technology.
zh: 美国在太空技术方面领先。

en: America is a land of immigrants.
zh: 美国是移民之国。

en: America is a country of immigrants.
zh: 美国是一个移民国家。

en: The U.S. is deep in the red.
zh: 美国负债累累。

en: America is very large.
zh: 美国非常大。

en: America is often referred to as a melting pot.
zh: 美国经常被称为一个文化熔炉。

en: The U.S. is a service economy.
zh: 美国是一个服务型经济体。

en: The United States borders Canada.
zh: 美国与加拿大接壤。

en: When did America become independent of England?
zh: 美国是什么时候脱离英国独立的？

en: What's your impression of the United States?
zh: 你对美国的印象是什么？

en: America did away with slavery in 1863.
zh: 美国在1863年废除了奴隶制。

en: He said that America declared its independence in 1776.
zh: 他说美国在1776年宣布独立。

en: America was discovered by Columbus in 1492.
zh: 美洲是在1492年被哥伦布发现的。

en: The U.S. thinks it is getting the short end of the stick.
zh: 美国认为自己吃了亏。

en: Let's look back on the history of the United States.
zh: 让我们回顾一下美国历史。

en: In the early days of American history, blacks lived in slavery.
zh: 在美国历史的早期，黑人生活在奴隶制之下。

en: American parents are willing to say good things about their children in public.
zh: 美国的父母很愿意在公共场合说自己孩子的好话。

en: In the justice system of the United States, there are twelve people on a jury.
zh: 在美国的司法系统中，陪审团由十二人组成。

en: While American methods are often successful, the Japanese educational system that produces the most literate people in the world surely has some lessons to teach the U.S.
zh: 虽然美国的方法通常是成功的，但日本的教育体系培养了世界上识字率最高的人口，肯定有一些经验可以教给美国。

en: The average American living space is twice as large as the living space in Japan.
zh: 美国人的平均居住面积是日本的两倍。

en: The American culture had been transplanted from Europe.
zh: 美国文化是从欧洲移植过来的。

en: Many criminals in America are addicted to drugs.
zh: 在美国，许多罪犯都沉迷于毒品。

en: The urban population of America is increasing.
zh: 美国的城市人口正在增加。

en: The typical middle-class American baby comes home from the hospital to sleep in his own bed in his own room.
zh: 典型的美国中产阶级婴儿从医院回家后，会在自己的房间里睡在自己的床上。

en: When applying to American universities, your TOEFL score is only one factor.
zh: 在申请美国大学时，你的托福成绩只是一个因素。

en: American kitchens are much bigger than Japanese ones.
zh: 美国的厨房比日本的大得多。

en: There is no end in sight to the U.S. trade deficit with Japan.
zh: 美国对日本的贸易逆差看不到尽头。

en: America's foreign debt shot past $500 billion.
zh: 美国的外债突破了5000亿美元。

en: The natives of the North-West Pacific Coast of America were probably descendants of tribes from Asia.
zh: 美国西北太平洋沿岸的土著居民可能是亚洲部落的后裔。

en: The death penalty had been done away with in many states in the USA.
zh: 在美国的许多州，死刑已经被废除。
